views.markdown:
+ Added option to remove the blurred background - Preferences rewrite

- iOS 8 support

- Change the colour of the call button
- Added support tab to preferences
+ Change status bar text and background colour

+ Hide the voicemail button

+ Hide the green call button background (keeps call function)

+ No longer needs phone app to be restarted to apply changes (thanks to xTheMaster3x)
- Added old preferences back by request

- Fixed white background showing

- Added an indicator when pressing numbers
- Added settings icon
- Cleaned up unnecessary toggles
Added preferences, yaaaaaaaaay crowd goes wild!
Currently only has a couple small preferences but I am learning!
